<!-- begin post --><div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 mb-30px card-group">    <div class="card h-100">        <div class="maxthumb">            <a href="/interviews/2021/12/23/10-39-%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B0-%D0%BF%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2-%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B7%D0%BD%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BE-%D0%B5-%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%BE-%D0%B2%D1%81%D0%B5-%D0%BE%D1%89%D0%B5-%D0%BD%D0%B5-%D0%B2%D1%8A%D0%B7%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B0%D0%BC%D0%B5-%D0%B7%D0%B0-%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%BE.html">                 <img class="img-fluid" src="/Uploads/nikolapetrov.jpg" alt="Никола Петров: Грозно е онова, което все още не възприемаме за красиво">             </a>        </div>        <div class="card-body">            <h2 class="card-title"><a class="text-dark" href="/interviews/2021/12/23/10-39-%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B0-%D0%BF%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2-%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B7%D0%BD%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BE-%D0%B5-%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%BE-%D0%B2%D1%81%D0%B5-%D0%BE%D1%89%D0%B5-%D0%BD%D0%B5-%D0%B2%D1%8A%D0%B7%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B0%D0%BC%D0%B5-%D0%B7%D0%B0-%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B0%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%BE.html">Никола Петров: Грозно е онова, което все още не възприемаме за красиво</a></h2>            <h4 class="card-text">Литературата едва ли е възможна без надежда. <!-- begin post --><div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 mb-30px card-group">    <div class="card h-100">        <div class="maxthumb">            <a href="/interviews/2021/12/20/08-56-%D0%B9%D0%BE%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%BC%D0%B8-%D0%B4%D0%B0-%D1%81%D0%B5-%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%B8-%D0%B8-%D1%87%D1%83%D0%B2%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D0%B5-%D0%B7%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%8F%D1%82-%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B9%D1%82%D0%BE-%D1%82%D1%80%D1%8F%D0%B1%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D0%B4%D0%B0-%D1%81%D0%B5-%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BA%D1%83%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%BE.html">                 <img class="img-fluid" src="/Uploads/joannaelmy.jpg" alt="Йоанна Елми: Да се мисли и чувства е занаят, който трябва да се практикува ежедневно">             </a>        </div>        <div class="card-body">            <h2 class="card-title"><a class="text-dark" href="/interviews/2021/12/20/08-56-%D0%B9%D0%BE%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%BC%D0%B8-%D0%B4%D0%B0-%D1%81%D0%B5-%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%B8-%D0%B8-%D1%87%D1%83%D0%B2%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D0%B5-%D0%B7%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%8F%D1%82-%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B9%D1%82%D0%BE-%D1%82%D1%80%D1%8F%D0%B1%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D0%B4%D0%B0-%D1%81%D0%B5-%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%BA%D1%83%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%BE.html">Йоанна Елми: Да се мисли и чувства е занаят, който трябва да се практикува ежедневно</a></h2>            <h4 class="card-text">Разбирането за това какво е насилие и какво не, е различно у нас. Просто сме назад като осъзнаване, което е нормално с оглед на историята. Насилието не е само шамари...</h4>        </div>        <div class="card-footer bg-white">            <div class="wrapfooter">                <span class="meta-footer-thumb">                    <span class="postboxcategory">                        <!-- Those categories are one-lined, to avoid unnecessary whitespaces in the HTML -->                        <a class="postboxcat-" href="/category/interviews">Интервюта</a>                    </span>                    <br />                    <span class="post-date">                                                20                        Декември                        2021                    </span>                </span>                <div class="clearfix"></div>            </div>        </div>    </div></div><!-- end post -->
